citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:25pm on
Tuesday, April 15, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the phone
number on file. The inspector waited for approximately 30 minutes for a call back and then left. Failure to provide access
to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may
result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:25pm on 
Tuesday, April 15, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the phone 
number on file. The inspector waited for approximately 30 minutes for a call back and then left. Failure to provide access 
to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may 
result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
